text: Ester Soldi (born 15 February 1970 in Varese, Italy) is an Italian dressage rider. She was in the 2014 FEI World Equestrian Games and at 3 European Dressage Championships. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1970 births Category:Italian equestrians Category:Living people Category:People from Varese Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy Category:Italian dressage riders
title: Ester Soldi
